Name: Space Slaughter
About the game: Test your skill while trying to unlock all ships by fighting on 6 unique maps full of different kind of enemies! 6 types of ships! Each with a different appearance, special ability and requirements to unlock! 6 types of maps! Each with different enemies, difficulty level, and visual appearance! Skill based gameplay! game is not that easy as it looks, you might need few tries to finish each map! 5 different buffs ready to help you through fighting! 6 dynamic space-type soundtracks! Mix of retro and modern sound effects!
